uk.ac.ucl.nterreri.GUI

Class PatientSearchTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel
        • uk.ac.ucl.nterreri.GUI.PatientTableModel
          • uk.ac.ucl.nterreri.GUI.PatientSearchTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel

    public class PatientSearchTableModel
extends PatientTableModel
    Extends PatientTableModel to inherit the methods responsible for correctly setting up the table view.

    Overrides some of these where relevant to only display the user search query results.

    Provides facilities to store and retrieve the original indexes of the elements in the result of the search query to allow a user to edit and remove patients in the search view.

    Author:
    nterreri
    See Also:

      • queryResult

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> queryResult

      • originalIndexes

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> originalIndexes
        Must also retrieve indexes in original data array (in patient class) because the search view displays a different data model (queryResult) with different indexes. This causes problems since MainFrame passes the rows selected in the JTables views to the Patient class patient edit and remove methods. And while the main JTable view (the parent class to this class) displays the Patient.patientRecords ArrayList, the present model displays the queryResult ArrayList, therefore it is necessary to store and retrieve also the original indexes of the elements of the original data in order to allow a user to edit/delete patients in the search view.

      • search

        void search(int field,
            java.lang.String value)
        Search view data search method. Used in place of Patient.search().

        Makes a partial copy of Patient.patientRecords (based on user query), and stores each of the original indexes of each element matching the query inside originalIndexes.

        Then stores the partial copy inside queryResult.

        Parameters:
        field - the field in the patient records
        value - the value to search for (uses String.contains(String))

      • getRowCount

        public int getRowCount()
        Displays as many rows as the size of queryResult when this has been initialized. Displays no rows otherwise.
        Specified by:
